
A careless developer signed two Bitcoin transactions reusing the same nonce. Recover the private key from the signatures and message hashes below: Sig1: c050c3f0b8d45b9e093a91cb96d097b24100e66585d0d8561e01c1231837493faf468127955c507bf05294a512db78d91067f6f16d5d575e42de370660623cfe

2. Second signed message
Curve: secp256k1The flag format is flag{hex(private_key)}
